27FD9937.Line7.6DE47: And when she learned of this vault and wanted to find it… I couldn’t say no.

5A202CB1.Line1.6DE47: You assume we’re treasure hunters, don’t you?

8E091FB5.Line5.6DE47: Look, ever since I can remember, my mother took me around looking for Horadric artifacts. It was an obsession.

D8F1EA65.Line3.BAE4: I’m not assuming anything. I just want some answers.

FB3FFC35.MenuLabel: “Why were you and your mother looking for this place?”
